titleStmt.title: SII 7.410: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 410. (A.R. No. 198 of 1901). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE KANDALISVARA TEMPLE IN THE SAME VILLAGE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . virame tuṇaiyākavum tiyākame Aṇiyākavum ceṅkoloccik karuṅkali kaṭin=tu kūṭal caṅkamat tāhavamallaṉai yañcuvittu vikkalaṉaiyuñ ciṅkaṇaṉaiyum Uṭaipuṟaṅ kaṇṭu maṟṟavaṉ māteviyaroṭu vastuvāhaṉam kaikkoṇṭu vijayasiṁhāsaṉattu viṟṟiruntaruḷiṉ korājakecarivanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīvirarājentiradevarkku yāṇṭu nālāvatu . coḻamaṇṭalattu nittavi
ṉotavaḷanāṭṭu kiḻārkkūṟṟattu kurukāṭikiḻār tiruvekampaṉ Āṭavalāṉārāṉa Atikārikaḷ jayaciṅkakulakāla viḻupparaaiyar jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Ūṟṟukkāṭṭukkoṭṭattu Uttamacoḻaccaruppetimaṅkalattu Uttamacoḻa Īśvaramuṭaiyār koyilil Āṭavalārkku tirunon=tāviḷakku muṭṭāme Erippataṟku Ivvūr Irukkum maṉṟāṭi maṭṭaṉ kampaṉ kaikkoṇṭa viḷakkuk kāl
cemmariĀṭu Irupattiraṇṭaraiyum manṟāṭi tiruveṅkaṭan tiruvaraṅkan kaikkoṇṭa cemmariāṭu Irupattiraṇṭaraiyum manṟāṭi poṟpaṉaiyan Eḻuvan kaikkoṇṭa cemmariāṭu nāṟpatteṭṭum Ākac cemmariāṭu toṇṇūṟṟu muṉṟum Immanṟāṭikaḷ muvaraiyum koṇṭu cāvā muvāp perāṭāka kaikkoṇṭu Ivarkaḷ munpuniṉṟu Ittirunan=tāviḷakku cantrātittavaṟ celuttakkaṭavitāka sammatittom Ivai koṇṭu Ikkoyilkāṇiuṭaiya śivabrāmmaṇan muttatokkapaṭṭaṉum I
ḷaiyatokkapaṭṭaṉum Iḷaiyatokkapaṭṭaṉum Uḷḷiṭṭom Ivarkaḷ colla Eḻutiṉeṉ Ivvūrk karaṇattāṉ veḷiccerik kāṭṭuppottaṉ kumāracatti tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉeṉ Ivai yeṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.410 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
